title: Illuminance Sensor
description: copyright 2016-2017, 2019 Open Connectivity Foundation, Inc. All rights reserved.

sensor.illuminance_illuminance.description: The sensed luminous flux per unit area in lux.

sensor.illuminance_range.description: The valid range for the Property in the Resource as a number. The first value in the array is the minimum value, the second value in the array is the maximum value.
